traits.Legendary Resistance (2/Day): If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.Multiattack: The balhannoth makes a bite attack and up to two tentacle attacks, or it makes up to four tentacle attacks.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Tentacle: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15+1d8 + 11) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

options.Bite Attack: The balhannoth makes one bite attack against one creature it has grappled.
options.Teleport: The balhannoth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
options.Vanish: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

actions: The balhannoth warps reality around it in an area up to 500 feet square. After 10 minutes, the terrain in the area reshapes to assume the appearance of a location sought by one intelligent creature whose mind the balhannoth has read (see Regional Effects below). The transformation affects nonliving material only and can't create anything with moving parts or magical properties. Any object created in this area is, upon close inspection, revealed as a fake. Books are filled with empty pages, golden items are obvious counterfeits, and so on. The transformation lasts until the balhannoth dies or uses this lair action again.

The balhannoth targets one creature within 500 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw or the target, along with whatever it is wearing and carrying, teleports to an unoccupied space of the balhannoth's choice within 60 feet of it.

The balhannoth targets one creature within 500 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw or the balhannoth becomes invisible to that creature for 1 minute. This effect ends if the balhannoth attacks the target.
